channel.title: Some one help with cilent runner
channel.description:
could some one help me when ever i try to run cilents i download an error shows up saying
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
plz help me im new.

omg im so sry u see in the code where it says only the best v2.5? change that to the name of ur server base… ex…i got only the best so if it said a different servers name i would change it to only the best[br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2007, 03:38:43 PM[/size][hr]ooo for running a client…sry

item.title: Some one help with cilent runner
item.dc:creator: @owner_razor owner razor
item.description:
@owner_razor wrote:

is that for a cilent or a server because this now shows up.

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Some one help with cilent runner

item.title: Some one help with cilent runner
item.dc:creator: @Lexii Lexii
item.description:
@Lexii wrote:

right click compile and click edit and delete everything there and put this into it… it should work… if it doesnt sumthing is wrong with the base or u dont have java =p

@echo off COLOR 0c title Only The Best V2.5 Compile + Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" server pause
let me kno if it works or not
if it doesnt another reason could be u need to download the newest jdk

Read full topic
item.source: Some one help with cilent runner
